SWWC.title: SWADE Damage Calculation
SWWC.soakDmgPrompt: {name} is about to take {wounds}. Do you want to attempt to Soak?
SWWC.rerollSoakDmgPrompt: {name} is about to take {wounds}. Do you want to reroll the Soak roll?
SWWC.soakedAll: {name} Soaked all Wounds and is not Shaken!
SWWC.UseWoundCapHint: When enabled, targets never have to suffer or Soak more than four Wounds from a single attack.
SWWC.UseGrittyDamageHint: Targets who take Wounds are prompted to roll on the Injury Table. Enabling this option requires a refresh to select the Injury Table.
SWWC.SelectInjuryTableHint: Which table is the Injury Table?
SWWC.RollGrittyDamageDesc: Gritty Damage rules are in play. Continue to roll on the Injury Table?
